Here is the list of scores for each sign in the line (12-6) system:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural and straightforward, but can be impulsive.
2. Taurus - 7/10 - Reliable and practical, but not very adventurous.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, with a flair for communication.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional and nurturing, but can be overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 8.5/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful.
6. Virgo - 7.5/10 - Analytical and hardworking, with a focus on details.
7. Libra - 8.5/10 - Diplomatic and social, with a strong sense of fairness.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Intense and perceptive, with a talent for intuition.
9. Sagittarius - 8.5/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be reckless.
10. Capricorn - 7.5/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, but can be overly serious.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, with a touch of rebelliousness.
12. Pisces - 6.5/10 - Imaginative and empathetic, but can be dreamy and unrealistic.
Note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations.
